<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Top Up Providers Products"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/topup/products/{providerId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the providers filtered by category and state code.

> The clientIdentification query parameter is required if the provider belongs to 4 = TRANSPORT category. If the clientIdentification is not sent or is invalid, it will return a 404 error saying that the provider was not found (transport providers only).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"stateCode","description":"","schema":{"type":"integer"},"in":"query"},{"name":"providerId","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"clientIdentification","description":"","schema":{"format":"int32","type":"integer"},"in":"query"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
